text: The men's 800 metres event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 12 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Marcin Lewandowski ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Oleksandr Osmolovych ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Abdesslam Merabet ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
